titleStmt.title: Truth will never shame its master. Dedicated by John Paine, a vvelwisher to peace and truth.
titleStmt.author: Paine, John, fl. 1654.

notesStmt.note: Title page printed on verso of A1.
Signed on p.[4]: "John Paine, souldier under Col. Haine."; signed at end: John Payne.
An address to Cromwell, in verse.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
